Types

Env = ref object
  id: NimNode
  via: NimNode
  parent: Env
  child: Table[NimNode, NimNode]
  flags: set[Flag]
  goto: seq[NimNode]
  breaks: seq[NimNode]

    tags: [RootEffect].}
